title: Haven't gotten any of the Xayah and Rakan icons + previous rewards from other promotions
body: I haven't gotten the blazing feather one yet and I believe I still have some backed up icons from other promotions as well. Could a rioter please help me? Is there a way i can stop this in the future such so I get the Dark Star Icons?

replies.body: Did you click the little bell next to your name on the client? Right under the X button

The best way to make sure you get those icons (if you don't have them by the date stated on the event pages) is to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Since we're still in the time period for the Rakan and Xayah Icons, so I went ahead and confirmed that you qualified for both event icons. You should see them on your account now!
